name: Iron Lance+

name: Steel Lance
description: Uses only pure ore to increase offensive abilities. Its charge is outstanding.

description: Iron Lance made from high quantities of Machalite Ore. Known for its large shield.

name: Estoc
description: Bejeweled Spear created by the Forest Elder. Functional and majestic.

name: Bone Javelin
description: Made of bone and very light. Easy of use and more of make it. Very popular.

name: Spiked Spear
description: Lightweight Bone Spear. Easy to craft and easier to use, giving it many fans.

name: Barbaroi Tusk
description: Improved Bone Lance. Treasured by the border dwelling hunters.

name: Dark Lance

name: Wild Bone Lance

name: Fragrance

name: Rampart
description: Iron Lance made from high quantities of Machalite Ore. Known for its large shield.

name: Lullaby Spear

name: Paralyzer

name: Ogre Tusk
description: Improved Bone Lance. Treasured by the border dwelling hunters.

name: Crimson Lance

description: Lance made from boar materials. Fills user with vigor and offensive lust.

name: Gatling Lance

name: Valhalla

description: Uses Thunderbugs to stun monsters and render them paralyzed.
